name: Mrs. John Innes Kane
biography: Mrs. Annie Schermerhorn Kane, scion of the Schermerhorn family, and her husband, a great-grandson of John-Jacob Astor, made philanthropy, amateur science, and world travel their primary occupations. Mrs. Kane’s will offered a number of New York museums their pick from her large collection of art and design objects.
biography_75_words: Mrs. Annie Schermerhorn Kane, scion of the Schermerhorn family, and her husband, a great-grandson of John-Jacob Astor, made philanthropy, amateur science, and world travel their primary occupations. Mrs. Kane’s will offered a number of New York museums their pick from her large collection of art and design objects.
biography_50_characters: A scion engaged in philanthropy, amateur science, and world travel
